name: chrono-node-divvito
description: A natural language date parser in Javascript

scripts.make-bundle: browserify src/chrono.ts -p [ tsify ] -t [ babelify --extensions .ts --presets [ env ] ] -d --s chrono -o chrono.js
scripts.make-minify: browserify src/chrono.ts -p [ tsify ] -t [ babelify --extensions .ts --presets [ env ] ] -d --s chrono -d -p [minifyify --output chrono.map.json] -o chrono.min.js
scripts.make: npm run make-bundle & npm run make-minify
scripts.coveralls: npm run test && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.types: tsc src/chrono.ts --declaration --target es2015 --module commonjs --outDir typings && rm typings/**/*.js

author: chris <chris@divvito.com>
